posts.raw_content:
These orgs like MSNBC, CNN, NYT etc are mostly funded by advertising dollars.

The #1 way to hurt them is to convince big advertisers to stop paying for ads on their networks or websites.

FYI this is exactly how Bill O'Reilly was deplatformed off Fox. It wasn't the sexual assault accusation that caused him to be dropped. It was actually when a leftwing org named Media Matters contacted every one of his advertisers and said "if you keep running ads on Bill O'Reilly's show we will publish news articles about how you are funding a sexual abuser" and enough companies got scared of bad press so they dropped their ads from his show. Then Fox News dropped him because they realized a new host could make them more money by bringing back those advertisers. Despite his enormous name recognition, he wasn't profitable anymore just because of the Media Matters threat to advertisers.

The political right needs to use tactics like this to destroy the institutions of leftwing political power like the media. If you convince advertisers that it is no longer acceptable to fund leftwing outlets that are fomenting violence and division, you will defund the brainwashing machine.
posts.author: AVeryNakedMan
posts.title: To fix America it is essential that we defund leftwing media outlets
posts.content:
These orgs like MSNBC, CNN, NYT etc are mostly funded by advertising dollars.

The #1 way to hurt them is to convince big advertisers to stop paying for ads on their networks or websites.

FYI this is exactly how Bill O'Reilly was deplatformed off Fox. It wasn't the sexual assault accusation that caused him to be dropped. It was actually when a leftwing org named Media Matters contacted every one of his advertisers and said "if you keep running ads on Bill O'Reilly's show we will publish news articles about how you are funding a sexual abuser" and enough companies got scared of bad press so they dropped their ads from his show. Then Fox News dropped him because they realized a new host could make them more money by bringing back those advertisers. Despite his enormous name recognition, he wasn't profitable anymore just because of the Media Matters threat to advertisers.

The political right needs to use tactics like this to destroy the institutions of leftwing political power like the media. If you convince advertisers that it is no longer acceptable to fund leftwing outlets that are fomenting violence and division, you will defund the brainwashing machine.
